name: Coal
description:
Coal is a game where you have to prevent the engine of a boat from turning off.

(PC Build Recommended)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 39 Compo by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in C# on Unity.

Tools:

Unity

Adobe Photoshop

Audacity

Maya

-----------------------

Directions:

Movement -> WASD

Mouse-> Position Shovel

------------------------

If you do not know what to do:

Throw the black rocks(coal) to the engine.

------------------------

Contact:

albertomelladoc@gmail.com

-----------------------

This was my 6th Ludum Dare entry and I am ok with the result. I think the gameplay is pretty bad but the visuals in Windows are decent imo.

Hope you enjoy it.
